title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 432.8 - Penalties for failure to report
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 432.8 - Penalties for failure to report

State Regulations

When a commissioner of social services has reasonable
cause to suspect that a person has willfully failed to report a case of
suspected child abuse or maltreatment, which such person was required to report
pursuant to title 6 of article 6 of the Social Services Law, the commissioner
shall report the suspected failure to the district attorney. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
432.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
